channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
I've found another server but it's always says when i try to login "Error connection to server"
Here is the server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541637.0.html
Anyone can help me?

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

guys in your server there is a server.java but too a client.java, in your client, is only a client. java.

so search in both folders for server.java. when you find in one of them server.java you know that.s my server. now go into other folder, search client.java.

open it.
press ctrl+f.

find 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1. thans it’s fine,

if you don’t find that try something like this:

no-ip. or look trough te topic if that guy posted the ip

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:8, topic:441325”][quote author=Naseem link=topic=544016.msg3987716#msg3987716 date=1336151836]

Why do you have two different folders for the client?

I don’t know… Those files after running the files that i downloaded them.
[/quote]
What?[/quote]

I got two files called: java.client, After extracing the source and the client, from here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541637.0.html

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

thock321:

Change the ip in the client

I’m not pro with those codes

Well i have two folders

  1. client 747
    -there is file called: client.java

  2. luminosity 474

  • there is file called: client.java

Which one i need edit with new IP
And what i need to search after clicking ctrl+f ?

Sorry i still beginner, lol

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

I’ve updated my question.

[hr]
[hr]

[quote=“Storm Powner, post:2, topic:441325”]1. it’s GUI or client.
2. log in with character and in your server. YOURSEVERNAME/data/characters. will be a char file.
3. yes vps, but that isn’t free.
4. go in sprites and search background if there aren’t any sprites use tom’s cache suite.
5. ??? explain it plox.
6. ???[/quote]

Thanks for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

  1. it’s GUI or client.
  2. log in with character and in your server. YOURSEVERNAME/data/characters. will be a char file.
  3. yes vps, but that isn’t free.
  4. go in sprites and search background if there aren’t any sprites use tom’s cache suite.
  5. ??? explain it plox.
  6. ???

Read full topic
